name: KING PONG
description:
Welcome to a world of Epic table-tennis action where everyone can be a pro…

Think you knew ping-pong? Discover KING PONG, a fresh take on the iconic table-tennis gameplay where your style and reactivity will be challenged!
Master the Arcade mode or dive in a world-wide competition to prove your skills and become the ultimate King Pong champion.

Key features:
-Play for fun or glory in an online Multiplayer mode.
-Single player Arcade mode to defy an AI in several levels.
-Hone your skills and master Ultimate signature moves.
-Collect new rackets, shirts, headgear and more to customize your avatar.
